title: Valley Forge National Historical Park: Do Business With Us
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Do Business With Us             Do Business With Us       Leasing of Park Buildings The National Park Service at Valley Forge National Historical Park currently has historic buildings available for both commercial and residential lease. We are looking for parties interested in either opportunity. Carefully review the Request for Proposals (RFP) for more information and deadlines. Please visit the following pages for either commercial or residential opportunities. Commercial Leasing Residential Leasing   Â    Event Venue Rental The Philander Chase Knox Estate is availabe for private Events through the National Park Service for-profit partner, Valley Forge Park Events LLC. The building is available for weddings, parties, etc. For more information, please follow the link below: Valley Forge Park Events
